text: Innum ninaivu kurunkal; hpir'avnin kuttattaritamiruntu nam unkalaik kapparrinom; avarkal unkalukkuk kotiya vetanaikalaik kotuttuk kontiruntarkal; avarkal unkal an makkalaik kolai ceytuvittu, (unkalaic cirumaippatuttuvatarkaka) unkal pen makkalai uyirutan valavittarkal; itil unkalukku unakal iraivanitamiruntu oru perum cotanai erpattiruntatu
